title: Material list mappings
description: Patches and other mappings for MaterialList.js.

ignored_blocks.description: An array of blocks that will be ignored and will not be put in material lists.

block_to_item_mappings.description: Mappings for blocks that have different item names. If a block isn't found here, the item name is assumed to be the same as the block name. Regular expressions will be checked only if no individual match is found.

item_count_multipliers.description: Items that will have their count multiplied by a certain amount.

oneOf.description: Item names separated by commas. Regular expressions can be used with /.../.

remove.description: Will remove all instances of this from the item name.

special_block_entity_properties.description: Definitions for blocks that should be split up based on a numeric block entity property.

serialization_id_patches.description: Remappings for serialization_ids that go to the wrong things in .lang files. Regular expressions will be checked only if no individual match is found.

^/.+/$.description: Regular expressions to match serialization IDs.

blocks_missing_serialization_ids.description: Patches for blocks that don't have any serialization ID due to not existing in mojang-blocks.json despite existing in-game.

translation_patches.description: Translations that don't exist for whatever reason.
